program_description: Provides technical assistance to socially disadvantaged groups through rural cooperatives and Cooperative Development Centers.
application_invitations_published: Each fiscal year in a Notice of Funding Opportunity (NOFO) in the Federal Register.
eligible_applicants_3: Groups of cooperatives (of which a majority of the board of directors or governing board is comprised of members of socially disadvantaged groups)
funds_use_purpose: Provide technical assistance to socially disadvantaged groups in rural areas.
registration_requirement_1: Unique Entity ID (UEI) - formerly known as "DUNS"
socially_disadvantaged_definition: Encompasses distinguishing features such as race, ethnic origin, gender, or other features not common to people who are not socially disadvantaged.
getting_started_step_1: Register your organization in the System for Award Management (SAM)
governing_program_1: The Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act
governing_program_2: Public Law 118-42, Division B, Section 736 (Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2024)
general_note_consult_instructions: Always consult official program instructions or contact your local Rural Development office for help.
usda_equal_opportunity_statement: USDA is an equal opportunity provider, employer, and lender.
